ComicInfo.Summary: See credits page index for quoted (joke) credits from the issue rather than interpreted (actual creative duties) credits.Irons calls in an old marker with police chief Joe Siry as he tells him to deliver the missing Witchblade jewel to Sara. Sara visits Jake in the hospital and uses a new power of the Witchblade to try and heal him. Setsuke attacks and blows up Gavin Taylor but is surprised to find that he walks away unscathed as he captures her in return. Sara and Eric visit a museum where her new partner hints that he knows something about the Witchblade. They are called away to investigate a brutal S&M murder.
